caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Am glad to share that Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) MPs have ventured out to various parts of India to join the Tiranga Yatra. I congratulate my colleagues. MPs shared excellent images of the Tiranga Yatras from all over India, on NM App. Over the next few days, I would be sharing some of them. 

You will find many more Tiranga Yatra photos on the App & many more will come. Keep watching this space for more. http://nm4.in/dnldapp
